"Are you sure you're using the sandwich toaster correctly? It's quite simple, just place your sandwich in the toaster and press down on the lever. The toast will pop up when it's done."
"Maybe you need to adjust the on the sandwich toaster. There's usually a setting that allows you to adjust the, which can help your sandwich toast more evenly."
